title: Molly Winik Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Molly Winik? Check out all of Molly Winik's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogMolly Winik Senior Content Marketing Manager Molly Winik Molly Winik is a Digital Research & Ecommerce Specialist with 8+ years of experience in marketing, content creation, and public relations. Her articles have been featured on Mention, The Times of Israel, and Culture Trip. When she’s not keeping tabs on the digital world, Molly is chasing after her daughter, planning her next vacation (if you need a detailed itinerary, she’s your girl), taking her golden retriever Sansa on long walks, or struggling over the New York Times’ Sunday crossword puzzle. Molly holds a Bachelor’s Degree from Franklin & Marshall College and a Master’s Degree in Political Science from Tel Aviv University.
